question: As of 2020, which Indian company has received the biggest-ever investment of Google?
explanation:
Technology Giant Google has paid Rs 33,737 crore to Reliance Industries Limitedâ€™s (RIL) digital subsidiary, Jio Platforms Ltd.
Google will now hold 7.73% stake in Jio Platforms and has joined the list of global investors including Facebook, Silver Lake, General Atlantic among others. This is also the biggest-ever investment of Google in an Indian company.
